Humanity, Allied With Divinity, Can Keep the Law

Then Jesus came from Galilee to John at the Jordan to be baptized by him. And John tried to prevent Him, saying, \93I need to be baptized by You, and are You coming to me?\94 But Jesus answered and said to him, \93Permit it to be so now, for thus it is fitting for us to fulfill all righteousness.\94 Then he allowed Him. Matthew 3:13-15, NKJV.
